A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went in a big fan of Rian Johnson's previous work and hoping he could walk the tightrope of making a smart but still entertaining Star Wars movie. Instead\, what we have here is a movie that fails at its attempts at humor and insight\, fails to keep a respectable run time\, fails to make us care about a single one of the many plastic characters\, and fails to properly use the most bankable movie prop in history (the lightsaber). All I? wanted was a Luke Skywalker Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon moment and all I? got was a moping train wreck of a character arch. Finn and Rose is unwatchable\, which sucks because your stuck watching them for what feels like the whole movie . The critics are in on the Disney takeover and are definitely being paid. Don't make the mistake I? made by paying Disney to disrespect your time.
